tags.name: rich-text-editor-button
tags.description:
`rich-text-editor-button`
is a basic button for rich text editor (custom buttons can extend RichTextEditorButtonBehaviors)

### Styling
`<rich-text-editor-button>` uses RichTextToolbarStyles constant to set 
SimpleToolbarBehaviors's simple-toolbar/simple-toolbar-button variables.

To further customize a toolbar and its buttons:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--rich-text-editor-border-color | default border color | #ddd
--rich-text-editor-border-width | default border width | 1px
--rich-text-editor-bg | default toolbar background | #ffffff
--rich-text-editor-button-opacity | default button opacity | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-color | default button color | #444
--rich-text-editor-button-bg | default button background | #ffffff
--rich-text-editor-button-border-color | overrides default border-color for buttons | transparent
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-opacity | overrides default opacity when button is toggled | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-color | overrides default text color when button is toggled | #222
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-bg | overrides default background when button is toggled | #ddd
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-border-color | overrides default border-color when button is toggled | transparent
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-opacity | overrides default opacity when button is hovered or focused | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-color | overrides default text color when button is hovered or focused  | #000
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-bg | overrides default background when button is hovered or focused | #f0f0f0
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-border-color | overrides default border-color when button is hovered or focused | unset
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-opacity | overrides default opacity when button is disabled | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-color | overrides default text color when button is disabled | #666
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-bg | overrides default background when button is disabled | transparent
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-border-color | overrides default border-color when button is toggled | transparent

Events:

  * `highlight` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

  * `highlightnode` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `selectrange` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `selectnode` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `selectnodeccontents` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `wrapselection` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `command` {`CustomEvent<{ command: string; commandVal: string; range: any; button: this; }>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand.

  * `command-val` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `range` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggled-command-val` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `selectedNode` - currently selected node

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `__selection` - highlight surrounding selected range

  * `tagsList` {`string`} - tags edited by this button

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggled-icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggled-label` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggled-tooltip` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `show-text-label` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

Properties:

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand.

  * `commandVal` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `range` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggledCommand` {`string`} - The command used for document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggledCommandVal` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `selectedNode` - currently selected node

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `operationCommand` - gets command param for document.execCommand

  * `operationCommandVal` - gets value param for document.execCommand

  * `tagsArray` {`string[]`} - tagslist as an array

  * `__selection` - highlight surrounding selected range

  * `tagsList` {`string`} - tags edited by this button

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the icon.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggledIcon` {`string`} - Optional iron icon name for the button if it is toggled.

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggledTooltip` {`string`} - Label for the icon, if button is toggled.

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `currentTooltip` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `isToggled` {`boolean`} - whether button is toggled

  * `hasLabel` {`boolean`} - is label specified

  * `hasIcon` {`boolean`} - is icon specified

  * `hasTooltip` {`boolean`} - is tooltip specified

  * `labelVisible` {`boolean`} - is visible label is needed or specified

  * `tooltipVisible` {`boolean`} - is tooltip needed or specified

  * `iconTemplate` {`"" | TemplateResult`} - template for button icon

  * `labelTemplate` {`"" | TemplateResult`} - template for button label

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`"" | TemplateResult`} - template for button tooltip

  * `buttonTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - template for button, based on whether or not the button toggles

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - Show text label even if an icon is named?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

tags.name: rich-text-editor-breadcrumbs
tags.description:
`rich-text-editor-breadcrumbs`
a toolbar of selection's ancestor breadcrumbs

### Styling
`<rich-text-editor-breadcrumbs>` uses RichTextToolbarStyles constant 
from rich-text-editor-toolbar to set SimpleToolbarBehaviors's 
simple-toolbar/simple-toolbar-button variables.

Events:

  * `breadcrumb-click` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `controls` {`string`} - active rict-text-editor.

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Hide breadcrumbs

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should breadcrumbs stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `label` {`string`} - breadcrumb labels.

Properties:

  * `controls` {`string`} - active rict-text-editor.

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Hide breadcrumbs

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should breadcrumbs stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `label` {`string`} - breadcrumb labels.

tags.name: rich-text-editor-toolbar-full
tags.description:
`rich-text-editor-toolbar-full`
`a full toolbar with breadcrumbs for the rich text editor`

Events:

  * `cancel` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `disableediting` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `highlight` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

  * `register` {`CustomEvent<{ remove: boolean; toolbar: this; }>`} - 

  * `setrange` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: any; range: any; }>`} - 

  * `selectnode` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `selectnodecontents` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `selectrange` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `pastefromclipboard` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `shortcut-key-pressed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `editor` - `rich-text-editor` element that is currently in `editing` mode

  * `savedSelection` - current text selected range.

  * `range` - current text selected range, which is actually a range.

  * `registered` {`boolean`} - selection singleton

  * `selectedNode` - currently selected node

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `show` {`string`} - when to make toolbar visible:
"always" to keep it visible,
"selection" when there is an active selection,
or defaults to only when connected to a toolbar

  * `paste-disabled` {`boolean`} - hides paste button in Firefox

  * `__promptOpen` {`boolean`} - whether prompt is open

  * `__selection` - selection singleton

  * `clickableElements` - Tracks inline widgets that require selection data

  * `breadcrumbs-label` {`string`} - The label for the breadcrums area.

  * `breadcrumbs-select-all-label` {`string`} - The label for the breadcrums area.

  * `always-expanded` {`boolean`} - always expanded so more button is unnecessary?

  * `id` {`string`} - `rich-text-editor` unique id

  * `more-shortcuts` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `collapse-disabled` {`boolean`} - whether there is no need to collapse

  * `config` {`{}[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcut-keys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

Properties:

  * `hasBreadcrumbs` {`boolean`} - overriden default to enable breadcrums

  * `undoButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an undo button

  * `redoButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a redo button

  * `historyButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a history button group: undo + redo

  * `formatButton` {`{ label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a format button

  * `boldButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for a bold button

  * `italicButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for an italic button

  * `underlineButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for an underline button

  * `removeFormatButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a remove format button

  * `basicInlineButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { label: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a style button group: format, bold, italic, and remove format

  * `linkButton` {`{ icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a link button

  * `linkButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a link button group: link

  * `cutButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a cut button

  * `copyButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a copy button

  * `pasteButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a paste button

  * `clipboardButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a clipboard button group: cut, copy, and paste

  * `subscriptButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for a subscript button

  * `superscriptButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for a superscript button

  * `scriptButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a script button group: subscript & superscript

  * `symbolButton` {`{ symbolTypes: string[]; type: string; }`} - default config for a symbol button

  * `emojiButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for an emoji button

  * `imageButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for an image button

  * `insertButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for an insert button group: image

  * `orderedListButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for an ordered list button

  * `unorderedListButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for an unordered list button

  * `blockquoteButton` {`{ command: string; commandVal: string; label: string; icon: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a blockquote button

  * `indentButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an indent button

  * `outdentButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an outdent button

  * `listIndentButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: ({ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; } | { command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; })[]; }`} - default config for a list and indent button group:
ordered, unordered, blockquote, indent, outdent

  * `saveButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an save button

  * `closeButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a close button

  * `saveCloseButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a save and close button group: save and close

  * `sourceButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for a view source button

  * `sourceButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a source button group: view source

  * `defaultConfig` {`{ type: string; buttons: { type: string; }[]; }[]`} - default config for toolbar with
default history, style, link, clipboard, script, insert, and list button groups

  * `miniConfig` {`({ type: string; buttons: { icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; } | { type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }[]; })[]`} - default config for toolbar with
default a custom group of style buttons,
default link button group,
default script button group,
and a custom list button groups

  * `miniTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - a template that places toolbar in a container
so that it can be positioned absolutely

  * `editor` - `rich-text-editor` element that is currently in `editing` mode

  * `savedSelection` - current text selected range.

  * `range` - current text selected range, which is actually a range.

  * `registered` {`boolean`} - selection singleton

  * `selectedNode` - currently selected node

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `show` {`string`} - when to make toolbar visible:
"always" to keep it visible,
"selection" when there is an active selection,
or defaults to only when connected to a toolbar

  * `__pasteDisabled` {`boolean`} - hides paste button in Firefox

  * `__promptOpen` {`boolean`} - whether prompt is open

  * `__selection` - selection singleton

  * `controls` {`string`} - id of editor currently being controlled

  * `disconnected` {`boolean`} - determines if the toolbar is hidden

  * `noSelection` {`boolean`} - determines if the toolbar has an extive selection

  * `clickableElements` - Tracks inline widgets that require selection data

  * `breadcrumbsLabel` {`string`} - The label for the breadcrums area.

  * `breadcrumbsSelectAllLabel` {`string`} - The label for the breadcrums area.

  * `alwaysExpanded` {`boolean`} - always expanded so more button is unnecessary?

  * `id` {`string`} - `rich-text-editor` unique id

  * `moreShortcuts` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `buttons` {`any[]`} - array of rendered buttons

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - does toolbar have focus

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - is mouseover toolbar

  * `moreButton` {`TemplateResult`} - more button's template

  * `toolbarTemplate` - default toolbar template uses simple-toolbar

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `collapseDisabled` {`boolean`} - whether there is no need to collapse

  * `config` {`{}[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `icon` {`string`} - 

  * `label` {`string`} - 

  * `toggledLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - 

  * `shortcut` {`string`} - 

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcutKeys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

tags.name: rich-text-editor-toolbar
tags.description:
`rich-text-editor-toolbar`
is a default toolbar for rich text editor 
(can customize by extending RichTextEditorToolbarBehaviors)

### Styling
`<rich-text-editor-toolbar>` uses RichTextToolbarStyles constant to set 
SimpleToolbarBehaviors's simple-toolbar/simple-toolbar-button variables.

To further customize a toolbar and its buttons:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--rich-text-editor-border-color | default border color | #ddd
--rich-text-editor-border-width | default border width | 1px
--rich-text-editor-bg | default toolbar background | #ffffff
--rich-text-editor-button-opacity | default button opacity | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-color | default button color | #444
--rich-text-editor-button-bg | default button background | #ffffff
--rich-text-editor-button-border-color | overrides default border-color for buttons | transparent
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-opacity | overrides default opacity when button is toggled | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-color | overrides default text color when button is toggled | #222
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-bg | overrides default background when button is toggled | #ddd
--rich-text-editor-button-toggled-border-color | overrides default border-color when button is toggled | transparent
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-opacity | overrides default opacity when button is hovered or focused | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-color | overrides default text color when button is hovered or focused  | #000
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-bg | overrides default background when button is hovered or focused | #f0f0f0
--rich-text-editor-button-hover-border-color | overrides default border-color when button is hovered or focused | unset
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-opacity | overrides default opacity when button is disabled | 1
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-color | overrides default text color when button is disabled | #666
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-bg | overrides default background when button is disabled | transparent
--rich-text-editor-button-disabled-border-color | overrides default border-color when button is toggled | transparent

Events:

  * `cancel` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `disableediting` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `highlight` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

  * `register` {`CustomEvent<{ remove: boolean; toolbar: this; }>`} - 

  * `setrange` {`CustomEvent<{ editor: any; range: any; }>`} - 

  * `selectnode` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `selectnodecontents` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `selectrange` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `pastefromclipboard` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `shortcut-key-pressed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `editor` - `rich-text-editor` element that is currently in `editing` mode

  * `savedSelection` - current text selected range.

  * `range` - current text selected range, which is actually a range.

  * `registered` {`boolean`} - selection singleton

  * `selectedNode` - currently selected node

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `show` {`string`} - when to make toolbar visible:
"always" to keep it visible,
"selection" when there is an active selection,
or defaults to only when connected to a toolbar

  * `paste-disabled` {`boolean`} - hides paste button in Firefox

  * `__promptOpen` {`boolean`} - whether prompt is open

  * `__selection` - selection singleton

  * `clickableElements` - Tracks inline widgets that require selection data

  * `breadcrumbs-label` {`string`} - The label for the breadcrums area.

  * `breadcrumbs-select-all-label` {`string`} - The label for the breadcrums area.

  * `always-expanded` {`boolean`} - always expanded so more button is unnecessary?

  * `id` {`string`} - `rich-text-editor` unique id

  * `more-shortcuts` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

  * `collapsed` {`boolean`} - is toolbar collapsed?

  * `collapse-disabled` {`boolean`} - whether there is no need to collapse

  * `config` {`{}[]`} - Custom configuration of toolbar groups and buttons.
(See default value for example using default configuration.)

  * `__buttons` {`any[]`} - raw array of buttons

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - whether toolbar is hovered

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Should toolbar stick to top so that it is always visible?

  * `shortcut-keys` - Optional space-sperated list of keyboard shortcuts for editor
to fire this button, see iron-a11y-keys for more info.

Properties:

  * `hasBreadcrumbs` {`boolean`} - whether or not toolbar breadcrumbs
(override to force a toolbar to always use or not use them)

  * `undoButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an undo button

  * `redoButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a redo button

  * `historyButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a history button group: undo + redo

  * `formatButton` {`{ label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a format button

  * `boldButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for a bold button

  * `italicButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for an italic button

  * `underlineButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for an underline button

  * `removeFormatButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a remove format button

  * `basicInlineButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { label: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a style button group: format, bold, italic, and remove format

  * `linkButton` {`{ icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a link button

  * `linkButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a link button group: link

  * `cutButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a cut button

  * `copyButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a copy button

  * `pasteButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a paste button

  * `clipboardButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a clipboard button group: cut, copy, and paste

  * `subscriptButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for a subscript button

  * `superscriptButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for a superscript button

  * `scriptButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a script button group: subscript & superscript

  * `symbolButton` {`{ symbolTypes: string[]; type: string; }`} - default config for a symbol button

  * `emojiButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for an emoji button

  * `imageButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for an image button

  * `insertButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for an insert button group: image

  * `orderedListButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for an ordered list button

  * `unorderedListButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; }`} - default config for an unordered list button

  * `blockquoteButton` {`{ command: string; commandVal: string; label: string; icon: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a blockquote button

  * `indentButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an indent button

  * `outdentButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an outdent button

  * `listIndentButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: ({ command: string; icon: string; label: string; toggles: boolean; type: string; } | { command: string; icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; })[]; }`} - default config for a list and indent button group:
ordered, unordered, blockquote, indent, outdent

  * `saveButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for an save button

  * `closeButton` {`{ command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }`} - default config for a close button

  * `saveCloseButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a save and close button group: save and close

  * `sourceButton` {`{ type: string; }`} - default config for a view source button

  * `sourceButtonGroup` {`{ type: string; buttons: { type: string; }[]; }`} - default config for a source button group: view source

  * `defaultConfig` {`{ type: string; buttons: { type: string; }[]; }[]`} - default config for toolbar with
default history, style, link, clipboard, script, insert, and list button groups

  * `miniConfig` {`({ type: string; buttons: { icon: string; label: string; shortcutKeys: string; type: string; }[]; } | { type: string; buttons: { command: string; icon: string; label: string; type: string; }[]; })[]`} - default config for toolbar with

tags.name: rich-text-editor
tags.description:
`rich-text-editor`
a standalone rich text editor
(can customize by extending RichTextEditorBehaviors)
### Styling

`<rich-text-editor>`  uses RichTextStyles variables, 
as well as an additional style:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--rich-text-editor-min-height | minimum height of editor | 20px

Events:

  * `editing-disabled` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `editing-enabled` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `focus` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `register` {`CustomEvent<{ remove: boolean; editor: this; }>`} - 

  * `getrange` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `pastefromclipboard` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `disable-hover` {`boolean`} - don't reveal toolbar on mouseover

  * `rawhtml` {`string`} - raw html

  * `updateRange` {`boolean`} - whether to update range

  * `view-source` {`boolean`} - whether editor is view source code mode

tags.name: rich-text-editor
tags.description:
`rich-text-editor`
a standalone rich text editor
(can customize by extending RichTextEditorBehaviors)
### Styling

`<rich-text-editor>`  uses RichTextStyles variables, 
as well as an additional style:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--rich-text-editor-min-height | minimum height of editor | 20px

Events:

  * `editing-disabled` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `editing-enabled` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `focus` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `register` {`CustomEvent<{ remove: boolean; editor: this; }>`} - 

  * `getrange` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `pastefromclipboard` {`CustomEvent<this>`} -
